model
{
  for(i in 1:6){
  	for(j in 1:5){
 		 for(k in 1:13){
    			y[k,j,i] ~ dgamma(alpha[i,j],beta[i,j])
  		 }
	        alpha[i,j] ~ dexp(lamda[i])
		   beta[i,j] ~ dexp(psi[i])
 	 }
	  lamda[i] ~ dexp(1)
	  psi[i] ~ dexp(1)
  }
}

model
{
  for(i in 1:6){
  	for(j in 1:5){
 		 for(k in 1:13){
    			y[k,j,i] ~ dgamma(alpha[i,j],beta[i,j])
  		 }
	        alpha[i,j] ~ dexp(lamda[i])
		   beta[i,j] ~ dexp(psi[i])
 	 }
	  lamda[i] ~ dexp(a)
	  psi[i] ~ dexp(b)
  }
  a ~ dflat()
  b ~ dflat()
}

# Initialization for Gamma model
list(a=1,b=2)
list(a=2,b=1)
list(a=1.5,b=1.5)

data
